text: Death and the Maiden is a 1994 drama movie. It was directed by Roman Polanski. The movie is based on the play by Ariel Dorfman. It starred Sigourney Weaver, Ben Kingsley and Stuart Wilson. The movie was released in December 1994. == Cast == *Sigourney Weaver as Paulina Escobar *Ben Kingsley as Dr. Roberto Miranda *Stuart Wilson as Gerardo Escobar ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1994 thriller movies Category:1994 drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:American drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Roman Polanski Category:1994 independent movies
